price: It is He Who made the night and the day to follow each other so that everyone who wishes may reflect or become grateful.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ خِلۡفَةٗ لِّمَنۡ أَرَادَ أَن يَذَّكَّرَ أَوۡ أَرَادَ شُكُورٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
